text:
Question 165) The physical trainer of a basketball team has a squad of 20 players, with an average height equal to 1.80 m. In the last practice before the debut in a championship, one of the players missed the team due to a serious injury, forcing the coach to hire another player to restore the group.
If the new player is 0.20 m lower than the previous one, what is the average height, in meter, of the new group?
A) 1.60
B) 1.78
C) 1.79
D) 1.81
E) 1.82
